Chessboard as a game table: Instead of using a regular table for games, you can use a chessboard as a game table for various board games, such as Jenga or Tic-Tac-Toe.
Chessboard as a photo backdrop: Use the chessboard as a unique backdrop for photo shoots or as a backdrop for video presentations.
Chessboard as a music playing surface: Use the chessboard as a unique and innovative music playing surface, using the chess squares to play different notes.
Chessboard as a puzzle game: Create a chess-themed puzzle game by placing magnetic chess pieces on top of the chessboard and having players move the pieces to solve various puzzles.
Chessboard as a jewelry display: Use the chessboard to display unique and interesting jewelry pieces, such as chess-themed necklaces or earrings.
